item.title: European stocks rise; Renault up 6% after reports of Nissan-Honda merger talks
item.description: European stocks were higher on Wednesday as investors awaited the latest monetary policy decision by the U.S. Federal Reserve.

item.title: Dow futures bounce after nine-day losing streak; traders await Fed decision: Live updates
item.description: The Federal Reserve is widely expected to lower rates by a quarter point on Wednesday, but the big event is the central bank’s summary of economic pro...

item.title: Germany’s auto giants were already reeling. Now Trump wants to turn them into American companies
item.description: For Germany, the prospect of U.S. tariffs on European autos comes at a time when it's top original equipment manufacturers are already reeling.

item.title: UniCredit raises stake in Commerzbank to 28% as Orcel ups ante on pursuit
item.description: Investors are watching whether UniCredit will proceed with a takeover venture of Germany's Commerzbank or Italian peer Banco BPM.

item.title: UK inflation rises to 2.6% in November, in line with expectations
item.description: UK inflation data comes after wage growth quashed any last expectation for a final 2024 rate cut from the Bank of England.
